content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: lapis_lazuli
inventory=[{"type": "phantom_membrane", "quantity": 3, "index": 14}, {"type": "purple_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "mossy_stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 25, "index": 17}, {"type": "cyan_carpet", "quantity": 30, "index": 20}, {"type": "dark_oak_sapling", "quantity": 2, "index": 21}, {"type": "tube_coral_block", "quantity": 32, "index": 22}, {"type": "white_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 26, "index": 24}, {"type": "cod_spawn_egg", "quantity": 52, "index": 25}, {"type": "light_blue_concrete_powder", "quantity": 40, "index": 27}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_brick_stairs", "quantity": 8, "index": 31}, {"type": "lapis_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "brown_banner", "quantity": 4, "index": 34}, {"type": "silverfish_spawn_egg", "quantity": 22, "index": 35}, {"type": "piglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 30, "index": 38}, {"type": "dark_prismarine_slab", "quantity": 43, "index": 40}, {"type": "light_gray_wool", "quantity": 40, "index": 42}, {"type": "warped_stairs", "quantity": 60, "index": 43}]

thought: To solve this task I need to craft lapis_lazuli. Lapis_lazuli requires placing 1 lapis_block in the crafting table, therefore I will first need to move the lapis_block from slot 32 into the crafting grid.
act: move from slot 32 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: lapis_lazuli

thought: Now I can craft the lapis_lazuli by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 9
